items.title: Sensex, Nifty set to rebound after 2-day slide; key levels to watch on August 29
items.description: Dalal Street ended at the day's low, extending its losing streak to the second session as investors continued to sell off after U.S. President Donald Trump's 50 percent tariff came into effect.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) continued their selling on fourth day as they sold equities worth Rs 3856 crore on August 28, while Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) bought equities worth Rs 6920 crore on the same day.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty hints a positive start; US market gain, Asia falls
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average notched record high closes on Thursday after Nvidia's quarterly report fell short of investors' high expectations but confirmed that spending related to artificial intelligence infrastructure remains strong.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Reliance Industries, Hexaware, Lemon Tree Hotels, Afcons, Shukra Pharma, Paytm, Muthoot Finance, CG Power in focus on 29 August
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 29 August: Stocks like Reliance Industries, Hexaware Technologies, Lemon Tree Hotels, Afcons Infrastructure, Shukra Pharmaceuticals, One 97 Communications Paytm, Muthoot Finance, and CG Power and Industrial Solutions will be in focus on August 29.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Caplin Point, Jindal Stainless, Engineers India, Advanced Enzyme, Nykaa, Endurance Tech, and others on August 29?
items.description: A rebound may be possible after the severe sell-off, but sustainability is the level to watch given the bearish sentiment. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: Chinkerpoo Family Trust sells 1.3% stake in IndiGo for Rs 2,933 crore
items.description: As of June 2025, Rakesh Gangwal, and The Chinkerpoo Family Trust had held 7.81 percent stake in the IndiGo operator.

items.title: Sebi extends digital accessibility compliance timelines for investment advisors and research analysts
items.description: Regulatior's move is aimed at providing additional time to these entities to adapt their systems and processes, given the operational challenges raised by industry participants.

items.title: Rohit Sharma sells 0.5% stake in Reliable Data Services after 73% surge in current week
items.description: As per the shareholding pattern dated December 2023, Rohit Sharma had held 1,03,200 shares (1 percent stake) in Reliable Data Services but his name disappeared from the shareholding pattern dated March 2024 as his stake dropped below 1 percent mark.

items.title: Reliance Industries AGM: Meta AI JV, Jio IPO create compelling investment case
items.description: Reliance Industries' AGM on Friday reveals a comprehensive transformation strategy with Jio's 2026 listing, aggressive FMCG expansion, and an AI joint venture with Meta positioning the conglomerate for its next growth phase

items.title: Business in the Week Ahead (September 1- 5, 2025)
items.description: In the coming week India, the US and the UK will release manufacturing and services data. Here’s what investors can expect from the week ahead

items.title: Top gainers and losers: Stocks that moved the most on August 29
items.description: RBL Bank, ITC were among gainers on August 29

items.title: Reliance Foundation building 2,000-bed medical city in Mumbai: Nita Ambani
items.description: The medical city will also house a college to nurture future generations of healthcare professionals, Reliance Foundation chairperson Nita Ambani has said

items.title: Taking Stock: Sensex closes below 80,000, Nifty near 24,400; FMCG shines, realty drags
items.description: Nearly 100 stocks touched their 52-week highs on the BSE, including CreditAccess Grameen, HBL Engineering, Dalmia Bharat, Procter and Gamble Health, Authum Investment, among others.

items.title: Marico shares rise 2.02% on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis, as of August 25, 2025, indicates a bullish sentiment for Marico.

items.title: Sensex below 80,000, Nifty falls as IT, metal, oil & gas stocks tumble; small, midcaps down 0.6% down
items.description: Laggards on the index were M&M, Infosys, Reliance Industries, Apollo Hospitals, and Adani Enterprises.

items.title: CG Power share rise over 5% as subsidiary launches Rs 7,600-cr semiconductor assembly unit in Gujarat
items.description: CG Power stock rose 5.38%  to an intraday high of Rs 699.75 apiece on the NSE, snapping a three-day losing streak.

items.title: Is Sebi revisiting F&O suitability? Recent remarks indicate entry criteria discussion is back on table and here's how it could look
items.description: The idea of product suitability or entry check for F&O was discussed with expert working group last year but was abandoned as participants were not comfortable with too much many measures in one go.

items.title: FMCG shares rise ahead of next week's GST council meet; Colgate, ITC, HUL gain up to 3%
items.description: Nifty FMCG index climbed 1.7 percent, with 12 of 15 index constituents trading in the green.

items.title: BSE, Angel One, other capital market stocks drop up to 4%, fall for 4th day on weak investor sentiment
items.description: Market sentiment has been weighed down by persistent global uncertainty, especially around trade and tariff issues

items.title: Zydus Life arm reports positive phase-3 trial results in rare liver disease, eyes USFDA nod in 2026
items.description: The Ahmedabad-based drugmaker plans to file for USFDA approval in the first quarter of 2026, targeting a market projected to reach $10.8 billion by 2026, growing at a CAGR of 36.3%.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty edge marginally higher as FMCG, bank stocks help regain momentum; India VIX eases 4%
items.description: Shriram Finance, Trent, Bharat Electronics, L&T, and ITC were the top gainers in the Nifty.

items.title: Advanced Enzyme shares up 8 percent to clock best day in 11 months on heavy volumes
items.description: Advanced Enzyme derives nearly half of its revenue from exports with a sizeable exposure to the US markets. Admitting that this is an 'uncertain time' due to the tariff situation, the company said it will focus on expanding human and animal nutrition segments.

items.title: Cochin Shipyard shares rise 2.03% in today's trading session
items.description: At 11:32 am, the stock saw positive movement.

items.title: Top midcap gainers: Yes Bank, Colgate, Ola stocks see maximum rise on Nifty Midcap 150 today
items.description: The stocks led the gains on Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: Samvardhana Motherson International shares rise 2.08%
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 94.03, Samvardhana Motherson International has seen a gain of 2.08% in today's session.

items.title: Yes Bank shares surge 4% amid high volume, among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The latest Moneycontrol analysis indicates a very bullish sentiment for Yes Bank as of August 25, 2025.

items.title: L&T Finance shares rise about 1% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 218.55, L has seen a surge of 0.97% in today's session, accompanied by high trading volumes, making it an active stock in the NIFTY MIDCAP 150 index.

items.title: AIA Engineering shares rise 0.52% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: AIA Engineering shares were trading up 0.52% at Rs 3,033.00 amid high trading volume in Friday's session.

items.title: CRISIL shares rise 2.12% in Friday's trading session; stock among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 5,009.50, CRISIL has demonstrated a positive trend, driven by solid financial performance and corporate actions. However, Moneycontrol analysis on August 25, 2025, indicated a very bearish sentiment on the stock.

items.title: Garment, footwear shares rise on hopes that lower GST may spur demand; Trent, Relaxo among key gainers
items.description: The top GST panel is expected to recommend that readymade garments and footwear costing up to Rs 2,500 may attract 5 percent GST.
